3: Gray Raven and Kamui... I'm relieved that all of you are fine.
We're currently sending another aircraft over to pick you up.
The desert here is full of Corrupted, we need to keep moving to avoid being attacked.
Of course, I'll keep updating the pilots of your current location.
Oh right, the mission time was quite long this time, well done to all of you. I'll get the hot water running to welcome you back.
Thank you, Miss Celica... Hm? Hot water?
